topic.title: Appendix C Amendments to other IFRSs

note.p: The amendments in this appendix shall be applied for annual periods beginning on or after 1Â January 2005. If an entity adopts this IFRS for an earlier period, these amendments shall be applied for that earlier period.

p.i: The amendments contained in this appendix when this IFRS was issued in 2004 have been incorporated into the relevant IFRSs published in this volume.
